metadata.title: CVE-2015-5395 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in SOGo before 3.1.0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5395` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sogo - 3.2.10-1build1
sogo-common - 3.2.10-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sogo package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.10-1build1').
